title: Tool List Config
description: Information needed to create a webpage listing toolbox tools.

general_info_text.description: Text describing the webpage, will show up on the page

list_of_models.description: The models in the location_of_model_list directory that should be shown on the webpage. They must be spelled (case sensitive) as the .json files are named.

location_of_model_list.description: The path to the directory where the model file json specifications are located.

main_title.description: Title of page shown in the browser tab next to the favicon

google_analytics.description: A webaddress needed for google analytics

google_analytics_code.description: A code needed for google analytics
